question1.title: Why I create this website?
question1.description: Since April, 2022, I try to design my personal website by myself.
question1.description2: All learned by myself, there was not any experience before.
question1.description3: I added some interesting elements in this website, make this website unique and special. I believe a software is not easy, it fullfilled soul and like artwork, every birth of software project needs long time of planning, designing, developing and testing.
question1.description4: Every website, projects I develop, I hope it can fullfilled its soul and concepts.
question1.description5: This is first time to design my personal website, so I named the theme Own Influence, hoping I can express more my Influence in the future by designing different beautiful soul projects.
